rr.event
Class AccessEvent

java.lang.Object
  rr.event.Event
      rr.event.AccessEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArrayAccessEvent, FieldAccessEvent
public abstract class AccessEvent
extends Event

Represents an access (read or write) event by the target program.

Nested Class Summary
static class AccessEvent.Kind
          What kind of access: FIELD: to a (static or non-static) non-volatile field; ARRAY: to an array element; or VOLATILE to a (static or non-static) volatile field.
 
Field Summary
protected  boolean isWrite
          Whether this access is a read or a write.
 rr.tool.TaggedValue newValue
           
 rr.tool.TaggedValue oldValue
           
protected  ShadowVar originalShadow
          The ShadowVar (aka shadow location) for the accessed location, right before the access is performed.
protected  Object target
          For arrays and non-static (volatile or non-volatile) field accesses, indicates the array or object being accessed.

Field Detail

target

protected Object target
For arrays and non-static (volatile or non-volatile) field accesses, indicates the array or object being accessed. Is null for static field accesses.

isWrite

protected boolean isWrite
Whether this access is a read or a write.

originalShadow

protected ShadowVar originalShadow
The ShadowVar (aka shadow location) for the accessed location, right before the access is performed.

oldValue

public rr.tool.TaggedValue oldValue
RR Experimental Element. Do Not Use.
When RoadRunner is configured with the -value flag, oldValue contains the value from the accessed location.

newValue

public rr.tool.TaggedValue newValue
RR Experimental Element. Do Not Use.
When RoadRunner is configured with the -value flag, tools can update newValue and thus control the value returned to the target program for read events.
Constructor Detail

AccessEvent

public AccessEvent(ShadowThread td)
Creates an AccessEvent for accesses by thread td. This event is then re-used for subsequent accesses by that thread, to avoid allocation overhead.

Method Detail

putShadow

public abstract boolean putShadow(ShadowVar newShadow)
Update the shadow location, returning true if atomic test-and-set succeeds.

getShadow

public abstract ShadowVar getShadow()
Get current shadow value. May be different than originalShadow, if interference happens.

getAccessInfo

public abstract AccessInfo getAccessInfo()
Get information about this syntactic access.

getKind

public abstract AccessEvent.Kind getKind()
Returns the kind of this event.

getTarget

public Object getTarget()
Returns the target field.

setTarget

public void setTarget(Object target)
RR Internal Element. Do Not Use.

isWrite

public boolean isWrite()
Returns the isWrite field.

setWrite

public void setWrite(boolean isWrite)
RR Internal Element. Do Not Use.

getOriginalShadow

public ShadowVar getOriginalShadow()
Returns the state field, right before event was dispatched.

putOriginalShadow

public void putOriginalShadow(ShadowVar newOriginalShadow)
RR Internal Element. Do Not Use.
